backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing requirements, affected files, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Google Fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/apology.html: Standalone single-file apology website with inline CSS/JS and a 5‑page flow including a mini‑game button interaction.
frontend/public/deploy-marker.txt: Marker file noting deployment date and build fixes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the ValentineFlow component.
frontend/src/components/ConfettiBurst.ts: Generates 100 falling confetti pieces with timed cleanup.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsBa: Creates 20 floating heart emoji elements with randomized animation.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page1Splas: Page 1 showing apology text and a Next button.
Page 2 showing hold‑you message with animated heart and Next button.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page3Apolo: Page 3 displaying a glass‑card apology message with Next button.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page4Forgi: Renders the forgiveness prompt with a static Yes button and an evasive No button that moves when hovered or approached.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page5Final: Displays the final page with confetti, romantic text, and a circular image.
Wrapper applying enter/exit transition classes around page content.
frontend/src/components/ValentineFlow.ts: Controls 5‑page navigation with timed transitions and page rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for handling Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines base Tailwind styles, dark theme variables, typography, animations, and custom UI classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending fonts, colors, radii, and enabling plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related tooling with ESNext module resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, env variable support, aliasing, dev server proxy, and optimized build settings.
project_state.json: Describes overall project requirements, architecture, features, and progress for the apology website.
